Answer.description: Each Answer is associated with a Question and belongs to a ConsultationResponse.

question_id.description: The number or other unique identifier for the answered question
examples: vii
Question 1
question_id.title: Question Id

theme_id.description: The associated Theme, if any. Omit if uploading.
theme_id.title: Theme Id

free_text.description: The answer to the free text part of the question, if any
examples: I don't think this is a good idea at all
I would like to point out a few things
I would like clarification on a few key points
free_text.title: Free Text

Answer.title: Answer

Consultation.description: Consultation is the top-level object describing a consultation. It contains one or more Sections, which in turn contain Questions.

examples: Consultation on Kit Kats
How should Kit Kats change
What shall we do about Kit Kats
name.title: Name

Consultation.title: Consultation

ConsultationResponse.description: A ConsultationResponse groups answers. For now it is also a placeholder for response-level information such as demographics, responding-in-the-capacity-of, etc.

submitted_at.description: The submission date and time of the response
submitted_at.title: Submitted At

ConsultationResponse.title: ConsultationResponse

MultipleChoice.description: A list of multiple choice questions with arrays of options or arrays of answers
MultipleChoice.title: MultipleChoice

MultipleChoiceItem.description: A multiple choice question and its available (or selected, according to context) options
MultipleChoiceItem.title: MultipleChoiceItem

Question.description: Questions can be free text, multiple choice or both. The presence of multiple_choice_options implies that the question has a multiple choice part.

id.description: The number or other unique identifier for this question
examples: vii
Question 1
id.title: Id

examples: Should it happen on Tuesdays?
Should it happen in the month of May?
Should it happen on a full moon?
Should it happen on Fridays?
Should it be forbidden on Sunday?
text.title: Text

has_free_text.description: Does this question have a free text component?
has_free_text.title: Has Free Text

Question.title: Question

Section.description: A Section contains a group of Questions. Consultations that do not have multiple sections should group all Questions under a single Section.

examples: When to enforce a Kit Kat ban
When to encourage the eating of Kit Kats
When Kit Kats are consumed
name.title: Name

Section.title: Section

examples: Concern about the price of sugar
Risk to wildlife habitats
Overall quality of outdoor space in the area
short_description.title: Short Description

summary.description: A free-text summary of the theme
examples: Respondents identified potential impact on the price of sugar, noting that proposed new legislation was very likely to drive it higher
Respondents flagged concerns around the conservation of habitats in the area and local biodiversity in general
summary.title: Summary

description:
A Consultation and its ConsultationResponses, plus Themes assigned by
the tool and metadata about the processing run
title: ConsultationWithResponsesAndThemes
